titles.title: A bill to create a legislative item veto by requiring separate enrollment of items in appropriations bills and tax expenditure provisions in revenue bills.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2501-2502)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 3/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to require separate enrollment of each item of appropriation and each tax expenditure provision in measures passed by both the House of Representatives and the Senate in identical form.
